attributes.action: Give British citizens the indemnity to slap one traffic warden a year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As part of a government backed initiative, patrons of this country should be allowed one "He deserved it" card per year. If you receive a ticket from a "Traffic-Nazi" then this card will allow citizens to punch, slap or kick a traffic warden without fear of prosecution.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
